description: Mobile techniques used by LAPSUS$, ATT&CK group G1004 (v2.1)
name: LAPSUS$ (G1004)

techniques.comment: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has used SIM swapping to gain access to victims’ mobile devices.(Citation: Krebs LAPUSS Mar2022)(Citation: Microsoft DEV-0537 Mar2022)
